Key Match Events: The Cavaliers trailed by 13 points in the fourth quarter but mounted a comeback to tie the game and eventually win
Pre-Game Insights: The team's 11-game win streak added pressure and motivation for the game
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Kenny Atkinson and guard Darius Garland reflected on the streak's impact and their focus on the bigger season goals
Miscellaneous Highlights: The team's historic and entertaining performance has caught the attention of the NBA world
